(2) Is capturing and storing CO emitted through my own operations considered to be
2
‘reduction’ or ‘removal’?
ESRS reference
ESRS E1 paragraphs 60 and 56 (a); Annex II Acronyms and Defined Terms: Net-zero target, GHG
removal and storage
Key terms
Net-zero targets, GHG removals
Background
Regarding the net-zero target, ESRS E1 paragraph 60 states: ‘In the case where the undertaking
discloses a net-zero target in addition to the gross GHG emission reduction targets in accordance
